attributes.action: Safe Standing. Give the choice back to football clubs.
attributes.additional_details:
Football supporters of the @SundayNightSlot [https://itun.es/i6FP9n7] podcast want Safe Standing legislations to be amended, and for supporters and clubs to decide if it's to be implemented - not outdated laws.

Safe Standing has been 'backed' by 27 official club supporters trusts, and 3 football supporters groups.

Using the German Bundesliga model, Safe Standing is the future of supporter interaction.
